verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David.) The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are <S%H5608>telling<s%> of the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of <S%H410>God;<s%> And their <S%H7549>expanse<s%> is <S%H5046>declaring<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of His <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

Their <S%H6957>line<s%> has <S%H3318>gone<s%> out through <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> And their <S%H4405>utterances<s%> to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H8398>world.<s%> In them He has <S%H7760>placed<s%> a <S%H168>tent<s%> for the <S%H8121>sun,<s%>

<S%H1931>Which<s%> is as a <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> <S%H3318>coming<s%> out of his <S%H2646>chamber;<s%> It <S%H7797>rejoices<s%> as a <S%H1368>strong<s%> <S%H1368>man<s%> to <S%H7323>run<s%> his <S%H734>course.<s%>

Its <S%H4161>rising<s%> is from one <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> And its <S%H8622>circuit<s%> to the other <S%H7098>end<s%> of them; And <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>nothing<s%> <S%H5641>hidden<s%> from its <S%H2535>heat.<s%>

The <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H8549>perfect,<s%> <S%H7725>restoring<s%> the <S%H5315>soul;<s%> The <S%H5715>testimony<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H539>sure,<s%> <S%H2449>making<s%> <S%H2449>wise<s%> the <S%H6612>simple.<s%>

The <S%H6490>precepts<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> are <S%H3477>right,<s%> <S%H8055>rejoicing<s%> the <S%H3820>heart;<s%> The <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H1249>pure,<s%> <S%H215>enlightening<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H2889>clean,<s%> <S%H5975>enduring<s%> <S%H5703>forever;<s%> The <S%H4941>judgments<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> are <S%H571>true;<s%> they are <S%H6663>righteous<s%> <S%H9191>altogether.<s%>

They are <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H2530>desirable<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> yes, <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H6337>fine<s%> <S%H6337>gold;<s%> <S%H4966>Sweeter<s%> also <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H1706>honey<s%> and the <S%H5317>drippings<s%> of the <S%H6688>honeycomb.<s%>
<S%H1571>Moreover,<s%> by them Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> is <S%H2094>warned;<s%> In <S%H8104>keeping<s%> them there is <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6118>reward.<s%>

<S%H1571>Also<s%> <S%H2820>keep<s%> <S%H2820>back<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> from <S%H2086>presumptuous<s%> [sins]; Let them not <S%H4910>rule<s%> over me; <S%H227>Then<s%> I shall be <S%H8552>blameless,<s%> And I shall be <S%H5352>acquitted<s%> of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6588>transgression.<s%>

Let the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and the <S%H1902>meditation<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart<s%> Be <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> in Thy <S%H6440>sight,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> my <S%H6697>rock<s%> and my <S%H1350>Redeemer.<s%>
